title: In war against its Soviet past, Ukraine refaces towering Kyiv monument
description: Workers in Kyiv replaced the Soviet coat of arms with Ukraine's trident symbol, continuing a campaign to purge Soviet and Russian symbols.

title: Japan, on Hiroshima bombing anniversary, decries Russia’s ‘nuclear threat’
description: The war in Ukraine has made the goal of nuclear disarmament more difficult, Japan's prime minister said on the 78th anniversary of the U.S. bombing.

title: Italian fugitive arrested after soccer celebration blows his cover
description: Vincenzo La Porta, with Camorra syndicate ties, was photographed celebrating Napoli's win after 11 years on the lam — then nabbed on a scooter in Corfu, Greece.

title: At least 15 killed in train crash in Pakistan
description: It was not immediately clear what had caused the incident but Pakistan’s aging railway network has long lacked funding.

title: Bangladesh battles its deadliest dengue fever outbreak on record
description: The latest dengue fever outbreak in Bangladesh has killed more than 300 people this year, overwhelming its vulnerable medical system.

title: Europe blinks in its commitment to a great green transition
description: Across Europe, which has suffered brutal heat waves and fires this summer, a backlash is simmering against some of the world’s most ambitious green targets.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky condemns deadly Russian strike on blood transfusion center
description: The Ukrainian president said a Russian-guided aerial bomb hit a blood transfusion center in Kupyansk, a city in the Kharkiv region, calling it a “war crime.”

title: Ukraine’s elite forces rely on technology to strike behind enemy lines
description: Minefields are now preventing special operators from sneaking behind enemy lines, forcing Ukraine's most elite soldiers to rely on technology.
